snippet: Iran is seen more as a meddler than a mediator in the Syrian conflict. But, with an international cease-fire plan in tatters, some are arguing that Tehran should be given a role in finding a peaceful solution.
abstract: Iran is seen more as a meddler than a mediator in the Syrian conflict. But, with an international cease-fire plan in tatters, some are arguing that Tehran should be given a role in finding a peaceful solution.

headline.main: Can Iran Play a Part in Syria Solution?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
